title: 𝟕 khoá học Online miễn phí tốt nhất về "𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭" 2019
body:
1. 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐧: Powerful mental tools to help you master tough subjects
"This course gives you easy access to the invaluable learning techniques used by experts in art, music, literature, math, science, sports, and many other disciplines."
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

2. 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐟𝐭: Break Through Obstacles to Learning and Discover Your Hidden Potential
"This course can be taken independent of, concurrent with, or subsequent to, its companion course, Learning How to Learn. (Mindshift is more career focused, and Learning How to Learn is more learning focused.)"
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/mindshift?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

3. 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐨 𝐏𝐮𝐛𝐥𝐢𝐜 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠
"If you’re a beginner, this course will help you quickly master the fundamentals of speaking. If you’re a seasoned speaker, this course will help you better understand public speaking and push you to the next level."
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/public-speaking?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

4. 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦-𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐃𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧-𝐌𝐚𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠
"Upon completing this course, you will be able to:
- Choose and apply appropriate problem solving and decision making processes and methods
- Identify common obstacles to effective problem solving and decision making
- Recognize the human variable in problem solving and decision making
- Assess major conceptual blocks and significant situational challenges
- Apply concepts to enhancing personal development and organizational performance
- Explain the key elements of problem solving and decision making and the barriers associated with them."
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/problem-solving?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

5. 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠
"This course will help you understand the role of creativity and innovation in your own work and in other disciplines."
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/creative-problem-solving?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

6. 𝐒𝐮𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐟𝐮𝐥 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧
After this course, with some practice, you will be able to go into any situation and command the room for as long as you like.
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/presentation-skills?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

7. 𝐈𝐧𝐟𝐥𝐮𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐏𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞
"The influence strategies you learn in this course will make you a more confident and influential leader, presenter, and decision-maker."
LINK: https://www.coursera.org/learn/influencing-people?DaoLocPhuc_Group-Coong-Cụ_Youth-Opportunities

Một số bạn chưa tốt tiếng Anh vẫn có thể học nhé vì các khoá học này đã được bổ sung phụ đề bằng tiếng Việt ;)
BY Đào Lộc Phúc - Group Coong Cụ
https://www.facebook.com/groups/Coongcu/
